ygData.subject: Re: A very good day...
ygData.msgSnippet: Man Kenross, can I like be an honorary member of your guild or something ;-) heh Rosha Cristi, Bard of 51 {insert something musical here} Guild Leader, Legends
ygData.messageBody:
Man Kenross, can I like be an honorary member of your guild or
something ;-) heh

Rosha Cristi, Bard of 51 {insert something musical here}
Guild Leader, Legends
Innoruuk

--- In eqbards@egroups.com, Ken Bachman <kbachman@e...> wrote:
> My guild went to Plane of Hate yesterday (Monday). A friend of
mine ran
> me in since I was work-delayed, so I logged in an hour or so into
the
> raid. At the time, I had four pieces of visible blue Lambent:
arms,
> legs, chest, head. There were two Bards up there; the senior Bard
(Jysa)
> had all of her Imbrued already.
>
> As soon as I logged on, one of our pullers handed me some
vambraces. I
> looked: Singing Steel! They'd found it in Sebilis the night
before and
> decided to give it to me! I'd heard them talking about that in
/guildsay
> the night before, but I honestly thought they were yanking my chain.
>
> An hour in, some warrior greaves dropped. The warrior who got them
had
> some guild-owned Mithril Greaves; my guild decided to give them to
me,
> also! The AC is less than Lambent, but I've been sorely lacking in
the
> STR department, so this was a welcome addition.
>
> We killed Innoruuk (I went LD, even though I was staring at the
corner),
> then Maestro (the Lute rotted, since both Bards there had one), and
> went back to the west camp. A few more Scorn Banshees and what
dropped?
> A Bard Helm!
>
> Another hour or so, another Scorn Banshee. What dropped? A Bard
BP!
>
> So I went from mostly blue to no blue at all in about four hours.
Pretty
> nice day for me, I'd say! Pretty nice day for the guild as a
whole,
> too. We got about 35 drops up there total, including 4 BP/Robes
(Shaman,
> Bard, Mage, Enchanter).
>
> Kenross Cantoforjado, 52 ("I feel small") songs, Silent Justice,
Innoruuk
